quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Dead Presidents
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, mary, delivering. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What did Mary said to Britt at the beginning of the movie Another Cinderella Story?

options.text: Now I wont get to go to the ball.
No thank you, Britt. Your mom is going to kill me.
Wow, Britt. You put way too much makeup on this morning.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No thank you, Britt. Your mom is going to kill me.

questions.question: In the movie Dead Presidents, what part of his body did Jose lose while serving as a demolition expert in the war?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mary Sunday

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Three murders are committed in the Academy Award-winning film, There Will Be Blood.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: great pumpkin

questions.question: What was Cleon doing after the war in the movie Dead Presidents?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: preaching

questions.question: In P.T. Andersons There Will Be Blood, which one of the Sunday Family tells Daniel about the oil?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Paul

questions.question: Where did Kirby put his fake leg after fighting Scooter in the movie Dead Presidents?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: on the dashboard

questions.question: What did Skip say in the movie Dead Presidents when he was told his girlfriend was looking for him?

options.text: Im at where Im at, and I be where I be

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Im at where Im at, and I be where I be

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cowboy

questions.question: Kelita Smith plays Delilah in the movie Dead Presidents.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Benson

questions.question: A record by what performer was playing right before Anthony got his revenge in the film Dead Presidents?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: James Brown

questions.question: What is Mary Magdalenes reply to Marys question Why is this night different than other nights? in the movie The Passion Of The Christ?

options.text: Because the Lord is merciful even if we prove unworthy.
Because once we were slaves and we are slaves no longer.
Because your son shall see His Father soon in all His glory.
Because we are celebrating the victory of life over death.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Because once we were slaves and we are slaves no longer.

questions.question: Finish this line delivered by Virgil Cole in the 2008 western Appaloosa: I enforce the law. Killing is sometimes a __________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: byproduct
